snippet: Wall Street backpedaled after weak economic reports helped push down prices for gold and oil, but the Dow and the S.& P. stayed ahead for the week.
abstract: Four-day rally in stock market comes to end as signs of slowing economy rattles commodity markets, weighing down energy and mining companies.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street backpedaled after weak economic reports helped push down prices for gold and oil, but the Dow and the S.& P. stayed ahead for the week.

headline.main: Gloom in Commodities Markets Ends a Rally
headline.print_headline: Gloom in Commodities Markets Ends a Rally
